sentences.en: Aim : To explore the morphometric grading method in the diagnosis of astrocytoma.
sentences.cn: 目的: 探讨星形细胞瘤形态定量病理分级诊断方法.

sentences.en: Could you please talk about the grading system?
sentences.cn: 请您介绍一下评分标准可以 吗 ?

sentences.en: Don't bother the professor while she is grading term papers.
sentences.cn: 当教授评学期试卷时,不要打扰她.

sentences.en: Is the grading department separate from both repacking and sales departments?
sentences.cn: 达规判定部门是否独立于分装和销售部门?

sentences.en: It must be advance standardization of the jadeite quality grading.
sentences.cn: 进而推进翡翠品质分级标准化工作.

sentences.en: My mathematics teacher is enthusiastic in teaching and strict in grading.
sentences.cn: 我的数学老师教学认真,评分严格.

sentences.en: Our teacher is known for her fairness in grading pupils.
sentences.cn: 我们的老师以给学生评分公平著称.

sentences.en: Preserve grading in these areas to protect grass seed mixtures planted in the exposed region.
sentences.cn: 保护种植在开阔地的绿化地带.

sentences.en: Provides loans line house grading of large & medium - size city , real estate information.
sentences.cn: 经营主业BusinessScope:提供在线贷款,各 大中城市 楼盘评分评级, 房地产信息.

sentences.en: Suitable for grading granulated stuffs and screening out powder and liquid.
sentences.cn: 适用于料物的颗粒分级选别及粉末、液体的筛分.

sentences.en: The gas hole , shrinkage cavity and crack were eliminated through up - grading technology.
sentences.cn: 并且改进工艺,以消除气孔 、 收缩和裂纹.

sentences.en: The grading ideal and the manager target of marketing strategy are made.
sentences.cn: 明确了市场营销策略的指导思想和经营目标.

sentences.en: The slide set is due for grading three days after the presentation.
sentences.cn: 在陈述后的三天内应当将幻灯片交上来打分.

sentences.en: The teacher spent all weekend grading the children's papers.
sentences.cn: 那位教师花了整个周末给孩子们的试卷打分数.

sentences.en: The teachers are grading the papers.
sentences.cn: 老师们正在给卷子打分数.
